Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and the quality it embodies, I believe it would significantly enhance the value of your collection or operations. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. I trust this opportunity aligns with your needs and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
